divs: Sighting DetailsI was at home watching tv at about 130 or so when the tv started to actfunny,shortly after that i noticed a flash of light through the living roomwindow as i looked out i saw a few more flashes through the trees.I live about200 yards away from the river so at first i thought it was a spot light from oneof the many barges that pass by but the light was not the same as i had seenbefore from them.Most of the time you can hear the sound of the engine from thembut there was no sound at all,very still out.So i walked about 70 yards up agravel drive to a clearing that over looks the river and into KY.Ther were noboats or anything that i could see or hear.Thats when i could see a faint glowacross the river into ky.My first thought was that it was some mil aircraft thati have seen now and then flying along the river and the surounding area.Butthere was no sound and it really dident look like any kind of aircraft.As iwatched there seemed to be 4 or 5 in the same area but not in any kind offormation the lights changed from a dim blue to a dim red then to a bright whitethis happend in about 3mins or so and did so 7 or 8 times in the span that i sawthem.But not at the same time or in any pattern.They moved from down into thetrees up to what looked like mabe 800 feet but hard to tell.They did seem tocome closer but never seemed to get out above the river.I watched them for aabout 30min or so then they started to move east in and out of the trees when ilost sight of them.I know that it sure dident look like anything that i had seenbefore and i havent seen anything strange since.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Rosiclare
This sighting has never been favorited.
